5.Name: Muck Resistance
5.Desc: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

11.Name: Earplugs
11.Desc: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

14.Name: Dungmaster
14.Desc: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.

16.Name: Effluvial Expert
16.Desc: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

19.Name: Attack Boost
19.Desc: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.

20.Name: Defense Boost
20.Desc: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.

22.Name: Recovery Up
22.Desc: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

23.Name: Recovery Speed
23.Desc: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

24.Name: Fire Resistance
24.Desc: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

25.Name: Water Resistance
25.Desc: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

26.Name: Ice Resistance
26.Desc: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

27.Name: Thunder Resistance
27.Desc: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

28.Name: Dragon Resistance
28.Desc: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

29.Name: Blight Resistance
29.Desc: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

30.Name: Fire Attack
30.Desc: Increases fire element attack power. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

31.Name: Water Attack
31.Desc: Increases water element attack power. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

32.Name: Ice Attack
32.Desc: Increases ice element attack power. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

33.Name: Thunder Attack
33.Desc: Increases thunder element attack power. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

34.Name: Dragon Attack
34.Desc: Increases dragon element attack power. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

35.Name: Poison Attack
35.Desc: Increases the rate of poison buildup. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

36.Name: Paralysis Attack
36.Desc: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

37.Name: Sleep Attack
37.Desc: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

38.Name: Blast Attack
38.Desc: Increases the rate of blast buildup. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)</STYL>

39.Name: Normal Shots
39.Desc: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

40.Name: Piercing Shots
40.Desc: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

41.Name: Spread/Power Shots
41.Desc: Increases the attack power of spread ammo

42.Name: Poison Functionality
42.Desc: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

43.Name: Para Functionality
43.Desc: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

44.Name: Sleep Functionality
44.Desc: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

46.Name: Blast Functionality
46.Desc: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

47.Name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
47.Desc: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(There is a cap to loading capacity.)</STYL>

49.Name: Critical Boost
49.Desc: Increases the damage of critical hits.

50.Name: Weakness Exploit
50.Desc: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

52.Name: Focus
52.Desc: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

54.Name: Handicraft
54.Desc: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However

55.Name: Critical Draw
55.Desc: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.

56.Name: Partbreaker
56.Desc: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.

57.Name: Slugger
57.Desc: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

58.Name: Stamina Thief
58.Desc: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

59.Name: Master Mounter
59.Desc: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

60.Name: Airborne
60.Desc: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

61.Name: Latent Power
61.Desc: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

62.Name: Agitator
62.Desc: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

63.Name: Peak Performance
63.Desc: Increases attack when your health is full.

64.Name: Heroics
64.Desc: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

65.Name: Fortify
65.Desc: Temporarily increases your attack and defense every time you faint <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>up to 2 times</STYL>.

66.Name: Resentment
66.Desc: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

67.Name: Resuscitate
67.Desc: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

68.Name: Horn Maestro
68.Desc: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

69.Name: Capacity Boost
69.Desc: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

70.Name: Special Ammo Boost
70.Desc: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo

71.Name: Artillery
71.Desc: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells

72.Name: Heavy Artillery
72.Desc: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.

73.Name: Marathon Runner
73.Desc: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

74.Name: Constitution
74.Desc: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading

75.Name: Leap of Faith
75.Desc: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters

77.Name: Hunger Resistance
77.Desc: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time. However

78.Name: Evade Window
78.Desc: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

80.Name: Guard
80.Desc: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

82.Name: Wide-Range
82.Desc: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

83.Name: Item Prolonger
83.Desc: Extends the duration of some item effects.

84.Name: Free Meal
84.Desc: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

86.Name: Speed Sharpening
86.Desc: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

88.Name: Bombardier
88.Desc: Increases the damage of explosive items.

90.Name: Mushroomancer
90.Desc: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

92.Name: BBQ Master
92.Desc: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

93.Name: Pro Transporter
93.Desc: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

94.Name: Master Gatherer
94.Desc: Allows you to gather more quickly

95.Name: Honey Hunter
95.Desc: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

96.Name: Carving Pro
96.Desc: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

97.Name: Divine Blessing
97.Desc: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

99.Name: Botanist
99.Desc: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

100.Name: Geologist
100.Desc: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

101.Name: Maximum Might
101.Desc: Increases affinity as long as stamina is kept full for a period of time.

102.Name: Slinger Capacity
102.Desc: Increases loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field. Limits the amount of ammo used when firing certain shots.

103.Name: Stealth
103.Desc: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

104.Name: Flinch Free
104.Desc: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

107.Name: Jump Master
107.Desc: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

108.Name: Survival Expert
108.Desc: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables like Sporepuffs or Wiggly Litchi.

109.Name: Aquatic/Polar Mobility
109.Desc: Lets you move more freely in water. Also prevents you from being slowed down by terrain effects

111.Name: Cliffhanger
111.Desc: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy

112.Name: Blindsider
112.Desc: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

114.Name: Scholar
114.Desc: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)</STYL>

115.Name: Entomologist
115.Desc: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters

116.Name: Effluvia Resistance
116.Desc: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

117.Name: Scenthound
117.Desc: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

118.Name: Forager's Luck
118.Desc: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

119.Name: Detector
119.Desc: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

120.Name: Tool Specialist
120.Desc: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

122.Name: Affinity Sliding
122.Desc: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

123.Name: Elderseal Boost
123.Desc: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.

124.Name: Intimidator
124.Desc: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. <STYL MOJI_YELLOW_DEFAULT>(No effect on certain monsters.)</STYL>

155.Name: Bow Charge Plus
155.Desc: Increases max bow charge level by one.

156.Name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
156.Desc: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

157.Name: Guard Up
157.Desc: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

158.Name: Protective Polish
158.Desc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

159.Name: Non-elemental Boost
159.Desc: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

161.Name: Hasten Recovery
161.Desc: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

162.Name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
162.Desc: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns

184.Name: Provoker
184.Desc: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

185.Name: Offensive Guard
185.Desc: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

186.Name: Coalescence
186.Desc: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

187.Name: Safe Landing
187.Desc: Allows you to quickly recover from heavy attacks that blow you back when you have your weapon unsheathed.

205.Name: Bludgeoner
205.Desc: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

206.Name: Adrenaline
206.Desc: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

207.Name: Coldproof
207.Desc: Nullifies the effects of cold weather.

223.Name: Clutch Claw Boost
223.Desc: Clutch claw weapon attacks wound monsters easier
